author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
You probably know about KDE Plasma on your desktop and maybe even Plasma mobile, did you know that there was a Plasma Bigscreen as well. It's been dead for a very long time but a few devs have decided to revive it and have some big plans.
